message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $10,000.
I'm interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $7,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $9,200. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $9,200 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $8,500. Can you consider that?
